website_summaries.verdict: These high-quality eye drops help relieve eye itching in just minutes.
pros: A single drop provides up to 12 hours of itch relief
Prescription-strength eye drops are available without a prescription
Help relieve itchy eyes due to ragweed, animal dander, animal hair and other allergens
cons: Bottle is very small in comparison to similar products

customer_reviews.title: Optometrist recommended
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor recommends this active ingredient over any prescription eye drop. It helps keep allergies under control and is fairly comfortable to use (just a slight sting when my eyes are already irritated). It helps with my dust and cat allergies, and also my husband's seasonal pollen and tree allergies. The only downside is you can't use it with contacts in.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but better than other drops available.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended Alaway for my eye allergies. I was taking other allergy specific over-the-counter drops, and while they worked great for instance relieve, I wondered how bad they were for my eyes. These are supposed to be better for your eyes compared to the active ingredients in other allergy drops. They do sting a little bit at first, and the relief isn’t instant, but the health of my eyes is most important.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for my allergies
customer_reviews.text: This stuff saved me from getting shots. I recently found out I was allergic to my pets. My eyes itch and hurt. I tried many different brands and various consistency's of eye drops. Nothing helped or the relief was temporary. I did a lot of research and read the reviews on Amazon. I decided to try several kinds and these worked better than anything. Its not 100% relief but I would say its about 80% better. It stings a bit at first but then the relief comes and I feel better. I just ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Michy

customer_reviews.title: Allergy drops with Naphazoline HCI and Pheniramine maleate work better for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the active ingredient is Ketotifen. The other allergy drops with Naphazoline HCI and Pheniramine maleate sting a little, but work quite well for me. These don't burn at all but they aren't nearly as effective, for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs RockTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I had it really bad with constant itching and even some crusting up in ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to use 3 drops in each eye to get the itching to stop, but now my eyes haven't itched since last night. I had it really bad with constant itching and even some crusting up in the morning from severe allergies but this product has helped and seemed to be a reasonable price too.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drops for allergy eyes.
customer_reviews.text: We live in windy New Mexico with tons of cedar trees, dust, etc. For a couple of weeks now I have struggled with itchy eyes, light sensitivity and sinus headaches, due to our allergy season. It was miserable. After trying so many drops I decided to give Alaway a shot. The difference was truly amazing. Actually unbelievable! No more blurry vision. Please try this product if you want relief from allergy woes.
customer_reviews.author: pq-california

customer_reviews.title: Helpful with seasonal allergies
customer_reviews.text: This really helped my dry eyes. I have Sjogren’s with seasonal allergies. My eyes were getting dry and crusty at night making it difficult to read. I would also recommend washing lid/eyelashes 1-2 times daily if you too experience eye dryness with seasonal allergies. This is pricier than store brands but there have been recently been issues with sterility with store brands. It’s worth my eye health to buy this name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lesli L. Wright-bobholz

customer_reviews.title: Contains same ingredients as more expensive drops and does the same job
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling to figure out why my eyes are so dry and I think allergies are part of the problem. This is a great drop with the same ingredients of other more expensive drops. It helps when my allergies kick in, but I wish it helped moisturize a little better.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this without looking it up first, and was surprised to see they still test on animals. It’s crazy that this stuff is still going on. No product is worth that. Clear Conscience makes cruelty-free eyedrops. Gonna stick with those.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve gotten Zatidor
customer_reviews.text: I got these eye drops because I needed something for the quickly approaching allergy season. I’ve used Zatidor in the past but my Dr also recommended this brand. Decided to give them a whirl since they would arrive sooner. Big mistake! These don’t do anything for me. My eyes are itchier than ever :( just ordered me some Zatidor and will have to be content wi th waiting until they arrive
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day
customer_reviews.text: Very good allergy eye drops. I use them every day. Without it, my eyes burn. I used to use prescription eye drops until my insurance would no longer pay for them. These are just as good. I use them in the morning and then sometimes again in the afternoon. They help A LOT. If you have allergies, you will find these very, very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: david brent

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My eye allergies get so bad. They were so itchy I wanted to take out my eyeballs! The first time I used this...IT 100% WORKED!!! My eyes didn’t bother me for the rest of the day. It was such a relief. I use them everyday and sometimes before bed. I also suffer from dry eyes and wear contacts. These drops do not dry out my eyes more.
customer_reviews.author: aldisa scallion

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty bad allergies. 90% of the time, these drops work for me -- especially if I use them twice a day like I'm supposed to. They're kind of pricey, but since they work, I definitely recommend them. I bought four bottles to make sure I have them anytime I need them. Downside: You have to wait ten minutes before putting your contacts in!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work...only burned... I should have returned them
customer_reviews.text: These didn't do much at all with helping my eye allergies. I hoped they would provide more relief than I am currently getting with my allergy pill and nasal spray, but all they did was make my eyes burn and give them a nice red bloodshot look all day with swollen eyelids....
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Taddei

customer_reviews.title: It works 90%
customer_reviews.text: So I thought I was only buying one box but it turns out I ended up getting 6 boxes for only $10 which is a win win for me! Maybe it was an error on their part or I didn’t read anywhere that I was purchasing so many. I’m fine w this because they messed up my first order! Anyway, the product worked almost immediately. The itching subsided about 90%. It wasn’t totally better but it was the relief that I needed! It does burn a very small amount, but it didn’t last long and it was bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Mel G

customer_reviews.title: Relieves irritation and itchy feeling
customer_reviews.text: My eyes have been irritated and itchy since the beginning of the year. I’ve never really had problems with allergies before, but after having check ups from my optometrist and ophthalmologist without issue I figured I might as well give this a try. Within a few days of starting, I coincidentally had an appointment with my general practitioner, who told me her pharmaceutical rep had mentioned using this product and finding it to be very effective. Now that I have used it for about 10 days I can say I agree.
customer_reviews.author: jrtampa

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the itching!
customer_reviews.text: I wear contacts and have many allergies, these eye drops help me a lot. They help with the redness and the itching!! I recommend them. You only put in one drop per eye with your contacts out then 10 mins later you can put contacts in.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Itchy Eyes Instant Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have recently changed from wearing regular glasses to Synergeyes contact lenses because of the masks fogging up my glasses. My eyes have been a little itchy after removing my contacts, and my doctor recommended these eye drops. I am so glad that I was able to use my FSA card to purchase these, and I had an instant relief after using the eye drops. I recommend these eye drops for itchy eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Helps my itchy eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have intermittent itchy eyes from seasonal allergies, or related to dander from one of my cats. The feeling is so intense I want to rub or scratch my eyes until red and swollen. I discovered Alaway a few years ago, and it takes my itchiness away within 2-3 minutes. A side effect is a slight stinging sensation 1-4 minutes after application. This is tolerable IMO compared to the intense itching felt from seasonal allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My eyes have been burning and watering the past few months. I wasn’t certain if I became allergic to my eye makeup or if I developed an allergy to pollens. My pharmacist recommended Alaway. I was hesitant since other eyedrops failed to make a difference. This one worked wonders. And better price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: BEST allergy eye drops!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic allergies, and have been on a search for something to relieve my itchy eyes. I tried the typical redness reducing eye drops, which had an immediate relief, but I found myself using it more often than I should because of the quick wear-off time. These are actually anti-histamine drops, so their mechanism of action is different from cheaper alternatives. I put one drop in each eye in the AM before I put my contacts on, these last me almost the whole day!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ong

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: These eye drops were recommended by an optometrist friend for itchy eyes due to allergies. I was hesitant since the bottle was smaller and cost was higher than other allergy eye drops. But, I was told the ingredients in this would be effective for a longer duration so I gave it a shot. So far, so good. The drops do not sting and seem to tame my itchy eyes.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked good.
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by my eye doctor for use with my contacts during allergy season. It seemed to reduce the itching and redness I had and allowed me to keep wearing my contacts, where normally I would have had to go a couple of days wearing my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relieves eye itching from
customer_reviews.text: These drops really help my allergies. My eyes were just itching like crazy this spring and these make them stop. It’s a very small bottle but that’s pretty much all you can find with this type of drip. They do make your eyes burn a little when you first drop them in but it stops quickly and relieves itching quick.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s awesome because when applied, gunk literally is washed out. It cleared up my vision within seconds and I really only needed it every 12 or so hours. I used for about 4 days and the redness and itchiness disappeared. The only drawback is that it burns my eye for a few seconds when applied
customer_reviews.author: Shezza

customer_reviews.title: Eye of the Fire
customer_reviews.text: Holy mother of fireballs. I was worried about these burning so I read a bunch of reviews. So many of you said it wouldn’t burn and I trusted you. The second the drop hit my eyes? FIRE. I couldn’t open my eyes for 30 seconds and had to dab them with tissues. The itching is gone and now I’m just thinking about the burning.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Neff

customer_reviews.title: These helped me so much!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible allergies. My eyes swell, water, itch and are just gross the whole month of May. I’m wish I had bought this sooner and saved myself months of suffering. I don’t know if this will work for everyone but it worked for me - took my pain away instantly !! So worth it for me
customer_reviews.author: K6789

customer_reviews.title: Great for itchy eyes from spring allergies
customer_reviews.text: These do the trick! Not expensive at all and work instantly. Great if you’re starting to get itchy eyes from spring allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Really works if you have allergies
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning for allergies and dry eye. It was recommended by my Optometrist. I find it really works in getting rid of the itching and red eyes I have due to those conditions. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J Flippo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Allergy Eye Drops
customer_reviews.text: These eye drops really help my itching, watering eyes during allergy season. They burn a bit when you first put them in. I guess that is because they are helping to correct the PH balance in your eyes. Our eyes are too important to be putting in any old Brand X eye drops. You can always trust Bausch and Lomb.. the eye people!
customer_reviews.author: For the Home

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Opcon A and Visine. I've also tried two different prescription eye drops. None of them seem to help with my problem of excessive eye watering. I tried this one based on the reviews and have to say it's on par with Opcon A, but more expensive. It provides, for me, temporary relief, but it doesn't last long enough to justify the price of these eyedrops. Frankly, I'm disappointed and will continue searching for a product that works.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My eyes always itched as a kid, I'm 50 now. Dr prescribed me this when i was about 40 or so & have been using since then. Works right away & only need a few drops in the itchy eye. This is my second bottle, use it rarely, but when I need it, I need it...
customer_reviews.author: Troy V

customer_reviews.title: The best for itchy eyes!
customer_reviews.text: The only cure for me during these horrible allergy season. No more waking up in the middle of the night rubbing my eyes raw.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Peach

customer_reviews.title: Works well and fairly inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these eye drops for several years now. Very effective for my itchy eyes, and also fairly economical.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd day of using this and my eyes no longer water and that makes me really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Worked from day one!
customer_reviews.text: Immediate relief from eyes itching all day and stopped the heavy watering every morning for about an hour upon waking! Even better, discovered I can get by using only once a day in evening after supper. Some of my oldest allergies are nightshade.
customer_reviews.author: G  G

customer_reviews.title: Great for relieving allergy related eye issues
customer_reviews.text: I use this to prevent my eyes from getting irritated due to allergies. Works great and prevent me from needing steroid drops when allergies make my eyes too bad.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Kjellman

customer_reviews.title: Works with contacts
customer_reviews.text: I have contacts and my eyes get really itchy in spring. I use these and they work just fine about all day long. I usually put a drop in each eye first thing in the morning and wait about ten minutes before I put my contacts in and they help with itch immensely.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These eye drops are amazing!! When my allergies are so bad that my eyes are irritated and itchy, I put one drop in each eye and within minutes experience relief. Most recently I went hiking and forgot to take my Zyrtec. My eyes were so swollen that I could barely see. Upon arriving home, one drop in each eye and 5 minutes later I could see clearly and had no itch! I definitely recommend these for anyone with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and fast acting
customer_reviews.text: If I touch a cat (and some dogs) and then my face, I get extremely itchy eyes that I must rub uncontrollably until they are numb. Unless I have these drops handy. One drop in each eye is enough for complete relief, and takes away the redness. I got one for my purse and one to leave at home.
customer_reviews.author: MroTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Relief with first use!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended these for my burning, puffy “allergy eyes”. Provided ref lied with the first use!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my itchy eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Eye doctor recommended these and they have been very helpful for my itchy eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Cocher

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from allergies, and one of my eyes waters a ton, i havent been able to find anything that works, until i ordered these drops and it works! It helped immediately, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Most potent drops for allergy eyes
customer_reviews.text: There are no better eye drops for itchy and red allergy eyes. 2 drops in each eye on the morning and I'm set

customer_reviews.title: Best allergy eye drop

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: This was prescribed by my optometrist when my eyes get watery and itchy. Works very well does get sour when applied on. A bit more pricey than your usual eye drops.
customer_reviews.author: I. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: The best Antihistamine Eye Drops!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using 'Zaditor' waste of money my eyes kept itching. I started Bausch + Lomb refreshing and relief less rubbing your eyes. I would purchase again from this vendor or seller. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product.  Not for severe allergies.
customer_reviews.text: Two and a half stars. They work when my allergies are not that bad. When I need something stronger I use Allergan gel drops.

customer_reviews.title: Fast a tjmmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Always have difficultly opening meds, but once I got it open...

customer_reviews.title: Best eye itch relief I tried
customer_reviews.text: I tried this and Zatador after the prescription my doctor gave me was still over a hundred dollars. She suggested I try Alaway or Zatador. Alaway worked noticeably better for me. Gave me huge relief.

customer_reviews.text: Seasonal allergies don't just give you a stuffy nose, and this is great for the eye irritation

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: These drops have immediately fixed my red watery eyes. I’m hooked.

customer_reviews.text: Eye Doctor recommended for allergy eyes and contact wearers. Seems to help with itchy eyes in fall and spring for allergy season. Put in before contacts.

customer_reviews.title: Stings a bit at first but then eye feels fine
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended after I seen my eye doctor. Reason was I had calcium deposits on the lid. This helped dissolve them.

customer_reviews.title: First use
customer_reviews.text: I will add more to this after a week of use. I have alergies and spring is bad. I got it this afternoon and tried it so far so good no more ichy eyes. Time will tell.

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Takes care of allergy itchy eyes one drop in each eye lasts 12 hours

customer_reviews.title: Works for red, watery eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described. My Dads eyes have been watering and red for weeks and within two days of using this product his eyes are back to normal!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for itchy eyes
customer_reviews.text: The more your eyes itch the more it will burn when you put it in, but after a minute or two the itching will totally subside. Fantastic for pet allergies.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first...
customer_reviews.text: After trying "natural" eye drops with no success, I decided to give these drops a try. At first, they worked in seconds. Now, not so much. They give me a slight relief but not enough to continue using them.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This really helps me with eye allergies. I didn’t know I had eye allergies-I thought I was having problems with my contact lenses. My eye doctor recommended this after discovering that my eyes were having allergic reactions. Itching, dryness, and discomfort is gone. I use it in the morning before putting my contacts in (you have to wait at least ten minutes), and again when I remove my contacts for the day.

customer_reviews.title: Burns

customer_reviews.text: I will definitely buy this again. My doctor suggested it and its a world of difference.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: It dosn't work for me. I am using this from almost a month now, i am not very happy with the result. it works for 2-3 hour and then my eyes start itching again, sometimes even after one hour it stop working. They claim, it works for 12 hours, at least not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sauda

customer_reviews.title: Good Eye Allergy Drops
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Alaway for several years and it is the best over-the-counter allergy eye drops in my opinion. Alaway and Zaditor have the same formulation and both work well. Generally, I find Alaway to be cheaper. I have dry eye and eye allergies, mostly tree allergies. When I am not being bothered by allergies, I use Systame Ultra, but when the allergies kick up, I switch to Alaway or alternate them. I am able to control my symptoms without resorting to more expensive prescription medications. My optometrist indicates the active ingredient in Alaway is preferable to other drops that contain naphazoline and/or pheneramine compounds.
customer_reviews.author: Terry I.

customer_reviews.title: Severe allergies  Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Feels great the next day!! No more itching, rash and tearing

It worked for me but it is a medication so everyone will react differently to it. I would talk to an eye doctor for a recommendation, not refer to an amazon review.

customer_reviews.text: Works immediately, very happy with the results and will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Better than prescription
customer_reviews.text: Works better for my eye allergies than prescription drops I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Helps with allergies
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended these bc I have allergies that irritate my contacts, they help a lot. They burn a bit at first but not too bad
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Drops
customer_reviews.text: The eye drops work really good. These eye drops are good if you have minor allergies to pollen, ragweed and pollen. It takes any discomfort that your eyes feel due to those things away pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Mallory

product_meta.title: Bausch + Lomb Alaway Antihistamine Eye Drops, 0.34 Ounces/10 mL
product_meta.description: When allergies make your eyes itch, don't suffer waiting for your allergy pills to work. Created by the eye health experts at Bausch + Lomb, Alaway is clinically tested to relieve the eye itch that allergy patients suffer from.
feature_bullets: Eye drops for itch relief: Help relieve eye allergy symptoms caused by pollen, ragweed, grass, animal hair & dander in minutes with these antihistamine eye drops containing ketotifen.

Alaway antihistamine eye drops help provide eye itch relief in minutes and last for up to 12 hours. This prescription-strength formula works right at the source of eye allergy symptoms, so it relieves eye itch faster than most allergy pills.
Do you suffer from eye allergies? If you have eye allergy symptoms, then you know how uncomfortable itching, watering eyes caused by pollen, ragweed, grass, animal hair & dander can be.
Bausch + Lomb Alaway eye care: Since John Bausch opened an optical goods store in 1853, Bausch + Lomb has focused on innovation & quality in eye care products, from contact lenses to eye drops.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
